data.title: Unusual and tasty Mexican
data.text:
Non typical Mexican food that is very tasty and a good value.
Service is excellent.  The Margaritas could use a little more tequila!

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Bill, it's great to see that you find our food tasty. My team and I definitely can't wait to see you back for more!

Yours, 
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A good Mexican restaurant
data.text: Lara's has been a good Mexican restaurant in Oshkosh for a long time. Now, it's not the only good Mexican place in town. I still like Lara's. The food is good. The staff is wonderful. The owner is a wonderful person. I like the décor.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
This just made my day -- your kind words were such a treat to read! Knowing the food and service can always impress is a true compliment, and I sure hope we'll get to see you back in before long! 

Best wishes,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Ok Mexican but good service.
data.text: We went for something very basic and received something basic, a taco salad. It was almost like a white mans version of a taco salad. But it was decent and filled me up. So there's a plus right there. Also the service was good if not great. I'll have to go back and try something else with a more authentic flair.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
I'm sorry that you didn't enjoy the taco salad! All of our recipes are authentic home-cooked meals from Mexico, so please don't hesitate to let us know if you need a recommendation. Hope to see you again!

Yours, 
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: quality mexican cuisine
data.text: I go there on occasion for lunch or dinner. The restaurant is clean and attractive. The food is great and the appropriately priced. I usually get the Burrito Especial with sour cream and enjoy the home made tortilla chips and salsa as a complimentary appetizer. The owner is an amazing chef.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your compliments! I sure do appreciate your kind words and I'll be sure to let Luis, our chef know how much you like his cooking.  While they are my recipes, I can no longer take the credit for the cooking since I am so busy being involved with the community and other projects. However, we all hope to see you back  soon for more Burrito Especials. 

Yours, 
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Meh
data.text: So, we are from an area where Mexican food is a staple. This was so far from that I can barely talk about it. The restaurant appeared clean and the waitstaff friendly. When we arrived, we were served a small basket of cold chips with some kind of salty seasoning heavily coating the top layer, but not the bottom. We were brought little plastic cups of salsa, unappetizing to say the least. The queso we ordered (usually a white melty delicious kind) was extremely close to Mexican Velveeta. I know this because I have had such a dip at parties. I would think being in the cheese state of Wisconsin, the cheese would have a least been native. My fajita quesadilla was ok and the rice with my daughter's taco was inedible. Not sure what happened there. For someone who has no clue what real Mexican dining is, this is the place for you. We won't be returning.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
It's disappointing to hear that you felt this way! All of our dishes come from authentic Mexican recipes that have been passed through my family for generations.  While I understand we can't be everyone's cup of tea, I'm sad that your visit didn't exceed your expectations. Thank you for taking time to let us know.
All the best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Beer and take out.
data.text: Great food here always. Stopped on the way home from work.  Had a couple beers and chips while waiting for take home meal. Great food even as take out. Service fast and friendly.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Great review here! We're glad that you stopped by -- it sounds like you really enjoyed the beers as well as your meal. Hope to see you back again sometime!

Yours,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Mexican Foos and Atmosphere
data.text: Just had dinner at Lara's in Oshkosh, WI. It never fails to bring back wonderful memories and tastes of Mexico! Very authentic menu you will NOT be disappointed with!

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for the love, Joye -- it's always an absolute pleasure to welcome you over for that hint of nostalgia. I hope to see you again soon!

All the best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best Mexican food!
data.text: I have been visiting Lara's Tortilla Flats for almost 40 years. It is my favorite,  always my go to Mexican restaurant.  One of my favorites is their home made salsa. I have been ordering their Fiesta Burrito which has green olives on it and their Cheese Crisp for years. You can't go wrong with any of their entrees.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
This is so great to read. I'm so happy that that you've been a fan for so long, and we're always glad to see you when you come by. Can't wait until your next visit!

Best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Amazing
data.text: I absolutely love love love LOOOOOOOOVE this place! The very first time i ever been there. The food is delicious, i had a wait for my meal, but was offered free appetizers while i waited.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
And we LOOOOOOVE this review! Thanks for sharing the love. I'm glad to hear that we left such a good first impression, and we'd love to see you again for another delicious meal!

Best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Basic Mexican Food
data.text: I have eaten at many Mexican restaurants in the Fox River Valley area and this place is good, but one of many.    The food is a tad bit bland and many times greasy.    The service has always been excellent!!   I like the interior decorations and atmosphere and it is a great place for families.    They are great with young kids!!

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Though we hope to do better than bland, I'm glad to hear that you can always rely on us for a good time! Thank you so much for the wonderful review. We'd love to see you again the next time you're in the mood for a great family dinner!

Best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Average. Very average.
data.text: Completely average food. Average service. Average atmosphere.   It seems there's a lot of missed potential. This place used to be the best Mexican restaurant around(in my opinion).  Last time I came here(2yrs ago) I vowed never to return. I decided to try it again and there was no improvement.  I had the Especial burrito and it was boring.  Even the chips and salsa were boring.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Boring and average are certainly not what we're aiming for. Of course, we can't blow everyone away, but I'm still sorry to hear that you weren't convinced to stay after your hiatus. If you have any constructive suggestions, though, we would love it if you contacted us directly and shared some of your feedback.

Best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Basic but good
data.text: Being from the area, Lara's was one of the original Mexican restaurants in Oshkosh. Food is not bad, but feel they can do some things better.  The menu is expansive, and drinks seem to be decent. While not the best Mexican, it is a great go.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
From your tepid response, it sounds like we can improve some things, so we'll definitely keep this feedback in mind. However, I'm a little curious to see what on our menu stands out and what can be improved, so if you have any more specific feedback, don't hesitate to call us!

Best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Standard fare
data.text: This was nice, average "Mexican" restaurant. We had a group of 5 -- 2 adults, 1 teen, 2 kids. We all agreed that chips were not good...very chewy and stale. The salsa was good and we liked that we each were able to choose our own level of spicy. The food was ok -- nothing to get excited about.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi, Jo. Average is okay, but we're always aiming to do better. Of course, I apologize that your chips were so stale -- that normally doesn't happen! But that's definitely an easy fix. I'm also a little bummed that your meal wasn't as outstanding as you had hoped, but I hope you'll give us another chance to impress you!

Best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A satisfying change
data.text: We have been to Lara's often. We do not prepare Mexican food at home much. A visit to Lara's is a pleasant change of cuisine. We have always found the quality, taste, and presentation of food, as well as the service to be up to our standards. Lara's also functions as an art gallery, as original art is displayed throughout the restaurant, and is for sale. We will return.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Can't wait for you to come back, David. Thank you so much for wonderful review -- we always do our best to provide the best authentic Mexican we can, and it's so encouraging to hear that you enjoy our food so much. Come back soon!

Best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Have Loved Lara's for years
data.text:
My favorite dish: Especial ◆
This is a wildly famous burrito! Soft flour tortilla filled with beans, your choice of chorizo, ground beef, shredded beef, shredded chicken, rice, beans or black bean-corn salpicon and enchilada sauce. Topped with sour cream, cheddar cheese and more enchilada sauce.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Excellent choice! You're right -- that's a fan favorite, and I'm happy to hear you enjoy it so much. Thank you for the marvelous review! We hope to have you back soon.

Best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: It is good.
data.text: Visited twice in December with friends. Once for lunch another time for dinner.  Lunch time - very quiet and easy to have a conversation with your group.  It gets crowded at night.  Great margaritas and good food.  The mole dishes are very good.  The portion is sufficient for one person. Service is okay.

data.title: Family favorited
data.text: Excellent choices and a range of heat. Delicious margaritas and comfortable seating. The chips and salsa are the best.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
You're the best! Thanks so much for the marvelous review. From the chips to the margs, I'm happy to hear that you like our menu so much, and we look forward to seeing you again!

Best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: One of my top 5
data.text: I notice that reviews of ethnic restaurants are most interesting and varied. Usually the reviewer has limited knowledge of the variety of any one kind of cooking. Mexican food like any other complex cuisine is tempered by the region, local food items, etc. Lara's has been around for over 30 years. Everything on the menu is made from scratch, not like Noodles or like chains that have a central kitchen and supply the stores with pre cooked pre portioned pre made food.  I have been eating there for almost two decades and will continue to enjoy the food and drinks.  Oh, the salsa is her Great Great Grandmothers cooking sauce recipe, the cornbread is outstanding, and the Friday fish fry is one of the best in the area.

owner_response.author: Ada T, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much. You're right -- all of the recipes we use are from scratch and have been passed down through my family for generations. It's always so wonderful to see the appreciation our customers have, and I apologize I didn't reach out sooner. That said, we'd love to see you again in the near future!

Best,
Ada, Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not as good as she once was
data.text: Over the years, Lara's tortilla flats has gotten to be more expensive and serving smaller portions. Unfortunately the food hasn't gotten any better to make up for it. Not my top choice for Mexican food in Oshkosh, not even my second top choice (or third or fourth).

owner_response.author: Larastortillaflats, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Sam S.
I am sorry to hear how disappointed you are with our restaurant. I am more than willing to listen and speak to you directly about your visit here and learn what specifically went wrong if you are willing to take the time to call or e-mail me directly. The only way to correct any problem or complaint a customer may have is if management is told immediately when a customer is present and is experiencing subpar service or food. We pride ourselves in serving freshly made, quality food in a nice atmosphere and served by friendly staff. If you did not experience that, it makes me sad that you didn't let us know immediately so we could have corrected the problem.
Again, please feel free to contact me in the near future. My phone number is 920-233-4440 or you can e-mail me at ada@larastortillaflats.com.

Thank you,
Ada Lara Thimke
Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Inconsistent quality of both the food and the service
data.text: We have eaten at Lara's numerous times over the years. However, within the past few years, we have noticed a significant decline in the quality of the food as well as the service, resulting in significantly fewer visits to Lara's.  It's unfortunate, because when it is good, it is very good, but there's so much inconsistency in the quality of the food that you don't want to run the risk of having it be another off night.  I used to take my entire family there for dinner (five of us), and the bill would be more than $100, without dessert.  That is a lot of money to spend, and if I'm going to spend that kind of money on dinner out, I will opt for more of a sure thing (you have to ask if any such thing exists in Oshkosh?).  The opening of the new Panera and Noodles & Co. restaurants are more likely to be much more consistent than Lara's. Sad, but true.

owner_response.author: Larastortillaflats, Owner at Lara's Tortilla Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear WiTammy,
I truly appreciate you taking the time to write your review about your visits to Lara's. It is of great concern to me that you have been dissatisfied not just on your last visit but previous visits as well. We obviously need to correct the issues that compelled you to write this review. I would appreciate listening to your comments personally if you are willing to take the time to talk to me.
I have been in business for 40 years and I would like to continue serving my customers for many more years. Your input would be greatly appreciated. You can reach me at 920-233-4440 or if you prefer e-mail, please send it to ada@larastortillaflats.com.
Thank you,
Ada Lara Thimke 
Owner
owner_response.title: Owner Response
